Finding the slope of example 1!
```{r}
fx <- expression(x^2)
dx_df <- D(fx,"x")
dx_df

x <- 3
eval(expr=dx_df)
```

Finding the slope of example 2!
```{r}
pa <- expression(2* (3*a+2)^4 - 5)
da_dp <- D(pa, "a")
da_dp

a <- 1.2
eval(expr=da_dp)
```
